text: Ha ho e-tla sesupo ho bona, ba re: “Re ke ke ra lumela ho fihlela re fuoa seo Baporofeta ba Allah ba se nehiloeng”. Ebile Allah U tsebisisa hantle eo A ka lebisang molaetsa oa Hae ho eena. Tlotloloho le kotlo e boima tse tsoang ho Allah li tla aparela bohle ba babe ka lebaka la merero ea bona e mebe
